about_the_game:
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic Beauty Hair Set SP ALL in PACK includes many hairstyles and costumes to further expand the range of editing, as well as fun content such as new events with maids.

5 Costume Sets
6 Hairstyles
2 Events
5 Studio Mode Items
1 Studio Mode Background
The above will be added to the game, expanding the range of gameplay.

【Costume】
GhahGhah sailor set
Sea cafe costume set
Ao Dai set
Frilly bikini set
Simple ribbon one-piece set

【Hair parts】
-Bangs
Short Airy Bob Bangs
Empress Bangs
Quiet Bangs
Blunt Bangs
Hiding Bangs
Inflated Bangs

-Back Hair
Short Airy Bob Back
Empress Long Hair
Asymmetrical Loose Bound Hair
Blunt Short Hair
Hiding Short Hair
Inflated Pigtail Bind

-Side Hair
Empress Sidelocks
Blunt Sides

-Hair Extention
Low Bun Hair
Inflated Pigtails

【Events】
Sea cafe management event
Sea cafe management route
*Corresponding personality types are Muku, Majime, and Rindere.

【Studio mode items】
Cake
Plate for food
Fried noodle
Canned beer
Beer in a beer mug

【Studio mode background 】
Sea cafe

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.
